examples.example: 妈妈用糯米做了香甜可口的粽子。

translate.english: Mother made sweet and delicious zongzi with glutinous rice.

examples.example: 糯米制成的年糕软糯香甜，让人回味无穷。

translate.english: The New Year cake made of glutinous rice is soft, waxy, sweet and fragrant, leaving people with an endless aftertaste.

examples.example: 春节时，我们一家人围坐在一起品尝用糯米制作的八宝饭，其乐融融。

translate.english: During the Spring Festival, our whole family sits around to taste the eight-treasure rice made of glutinous rice, and it is full of joy.
